title: Chat ban sure is fun and reliable way to have fair conduct
body:
So to the story (I will highlight the main points):

I picked aurelion in the champion lobby into enemy zed ,my elise honestly asked me **whether or not im retarded** before the game even 
started.

At the beggining (lvls 1-9) nothing realy happend I just died quite a lot (well 3 times in total xd) and went** 0 3 1 **and then the casual EUNE rape started. 

Everyone in my team except ezrael started heavily flaming to the point its been hard to watch.

Somehow enemy zed started to spam 0 3 in chat (dont realy know how it started) but I was ignoring it and he stopped after some time but he literaly said it 5 times at least.

Well i argued a little but never ever have I said anything toxic or offensive towards my team.

Later on into the game I got myself back on my feet well and went to like 6 5 (sure its not good but still better than what I started on)

Just to get my little sweet revenge or something I **once** said in chat 5 4 (around that score) to zed and he answered with muted.

After that there was a little clown fiesta in the EUNE style and ton of hate comming towards myself even tho I've been doing my darnest while my team kept on getting their scores worse and worse and they still flamed me for the stuff i had nothing to do with.

In the end there was this one last "teamfight" that ended up pretty fast with renekton dying because he jumped into 5 people, morgana and elise following right afterwards and ezrael because he didn't manage to back fast enough.

Right as morgana died (getting picked out on her own in the jungle in that fight) she started spamming: **,,report aurelion for feeding ,ty"** and then we lost. 

In the endgame lobby i asked her why does she want to report me when I came back into the game on my own and I didn't lose that game but she left immediatly.

Game ended with these scores 
**<removed by moderation>**

And just to top it all off here is what happend few seconds after I left the endgame screen (Elise is the guy who added me)
http://imgur.com/a/UWLUB

I didn't report a single person that game even tho I had the full rights to do so and I ended up being the bad guy. Riot you should realy rethink how the chat ban system and stuff works. Because this is not ok.

And yeah if you read it to this point before you start telling me how **I'm a little bitch **and its all deserved just stop and don't even waste your time because that's not the reason I posted this.

replies.body:
You're hyper focused on a single game here, when in actuality you the game referenced wasn't even the most severe that was considered for your penalty. 1/4 of you recent games include harassment, which is why you were chat restricted.

> its all deserved just stop and don't even waste your time because that's not the reason I posted this.

What is the point you are looking to make?

Tbh I am not looking for a point.I am just trying to showcase something and what impression people take from this is completly their own thing. To be blunt my first acc has been perma banned due to douches like this (also my own retardness for actualy trying to reason with those guys) and it cant be helped anymore. But on this acc Ive been trying to restrain myself as much as possible but I guess that reforming and stuff like that wont work.

>I didn't report a single person that game even tho I had the full rights to do so and I ended up being the bad guy. Riot you should realy rethink how the chat ban system and stuff works. Because this is not ok.

You say this, but you only use a single game as an example. Drawing attention away from other games you received in your logs that contributed to the punishment.

So you didnt report anyone of them, despite the fact that they all broke the rules, but somehow thats Riot's fault? You do realize that if you dont use the features given to you, Riot cannot know what is wrong?

Everyone gets mad from time to time so I dont realy take my time to report anyone unless its realy severe case. Also Im not blaming Riot for the fact that I didnt report them lol. Im flaming riot because as you can clearly see few retards are enough to get you chat banned because they tap 3 times with their mouse.

>Im flaming riot because as you can clearly see few retards are enough to get you chat banned because they tap 3 times with their mouse.

...

Im flaming riot because as you can clearly see few retards are enough to get you chat banned because they tap 3 times with their mouse.

But thats not even how the report system works. Maybe understand how the system works before critiquing it.

Well you can submit a ticket and provide the information you posted here in regards to the Elise player. What he said is not acceptable on any level. 

As far as not reporting post game, I have no idea why you wouldn't. It usually takes several reports in order for a person to be punished or chat restricted/banned. By reporting toxic players you are helping to prevent them from doing this kind of stuff to other players.

I dont want anyone to get banned because this is EUNE and this server is supposed to be a mental challange for the player on it. Getting people like this banned or restricted would actualy mean I wont get to have the fun arguing with them. But sadly not all the people realize the reason they arent on EUW is because of the mental challanginess.

Yeah and this post wasnt supposed to get those guys restricted or anything,it was made just to showcase what happend.
Won't get to have the fun of arguing with them?  Look how far that got you. :/

If someone is being a jerk, don't reply to them, just mute and report it. If you don't report it (and nobody else does either) then you're just letting them continue to do that to more players without repercussion.

---

I've removed the image of the match since it showed all the names, and we don't want to bring drama to the boards and start a witch hunt which is why player reporting/name & shame is against the [Universal Rules](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules). Please use the post-game reporting.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [PB&M channel of the Moderation Discord here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ZfE311GQ-discord-verification)
Sorry for breaking the rules. Ill be careful next time.

Do you understand that one game does not get you permabanned unless you were SO egregious, SO offensive, SO mean, and SO toxic that you made several people think that you were at the point of no return when they came across your game report?

> And yeah if you read it to this point before you start telling me how I'm a little bitch and its all deserved just stop and don't even waste your time because that's not the reason I posted this.

I LOVE the way you just changed this w/o an Edit !  Rude and sneaky to change a major comment without letting others know ! 

MHO:  I understand this is a hard thing to deal with, Yet is has been going on with everyone since the start of this !  Look it up I have said, and caught many throughout the years!   Fine though, I will keep to my posted comments, apologize when needed and Edit when I make a whole new Comment !

Closed mouths dont get fed.  You shoulda reported them if it bothered you.  Its now your fault if they dont get banned not riot.  
Also edit the pic to not have the names thats against the naming and shaming policy
Im mad because the banning system is based on few retards hovering over the ending screen and tapping 3 times to get you banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Hintcraf017,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Bydddmh1,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-05-05T21:10:48.176+0000)
>
> Im mad because the banning system is based on few retards hovering over the ending screen and tapping 3 times to get you banned.

Adults take responsibility for their own actions.
Amount of times dont matter and with that attitude i see why you got banned.

So if you didn't report a player that you believe harassed you, do you think it's Riot's responsibility to sit in front of the computer and read every single chat log of every single game that happens world wide... OR do you think it is reasonable to use and contribute to their flagging system where Riot only reviews flagged games to not waste time on reading chat records of games where no one was harassing anyone else....?

The chat ban is meant to punish you for things you said. You admit to flaming them. What are you expecting?

Also, you also have no idea if other people are being chat banned either unless you get an instant feedback report, however those are only given to the reporters in the game that triggered the instant punishment. You could have been the report for the game right before the triggering game and you would never know but that report you sent in counted and brought the harassing player to Riot's attention.

Youve misunderstood. The point is exact opposite. It takes few retards to get you banned just because they tap 3 times with their mouse in the ending screen and it should be changed. Thats what I am "mad" over.

Punishment isn't based on how often you're reported, it's based on the severity and frequency of your behavior; if you do nothing wrong (such as flaming other players or inting) then their reports will have no effect. This is why it is recommended you do not engage other toxic players with negative behavior of your own, and simply mute/report instead.

9 people report you while you did nothing wrong=nothing happens to you.
You report 9 people who broke many summoner codes=they get punished.

That's how it works.
you'll have to blurr out the team screen as we can see the name of those who's flaming you. I've done this mistake aswell :')
